attributes.action: Make the letter "Y" a vowel in the English language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that "Y" should be a vowel along with A, E, I, O and U. I have backing and evidence that this a good idea. First of all, i feel that a word is not completely correct unless it includes a vowel. Therefore words such as "By" and "My" are, in my mind and many other people's mind, incorrect. Also words such as "synopsis" and "xylophone" use Y as the vowel so why not make it a vowel or as i like to put it: Y not?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
